name: Who
content: I'm a UI/UX Front-end developer and an artist at heart with a love for writing code. I recently graduated from the University of Houston with a Bachelor's in Computer Science. While I can develop web apps with modern, cutting-edge frameworks, my passion lies in web design and predominantly graphic design.

name: What
content: I enjoy creating websites by coding them from the ground up.

name: Why
content: What drives me? The intersection of art and functionality. I believe that every website tells a story, and my goal is to bring your brand's narrative to life through captivating design. The thrill of turning concepts into interactive realities is what keeps me fueled.
